<?php
/**
 * component to place a gallery (i.e. thumbnail preview of a gallery) within a page
 *
 * @package phenotype
 * @subpackage application
 */
class PhenotypeComponent_1601 extends PhenotypeComponent
{
	public $com_id = 1601;
	public $name = "Gallery";

	public function setDefaultProperties()
	{
		$this->set("_revision",1);
	}

	
	public function initForm($context)
  	{
		// Customize input form with form_xy-methods

		global $myDB;
		
		$this->form_content_selectbox("","dat_id",PhenotypeApplication::con_id_gallery);
		
	}

	public function render($context)
	{
		global $myPT, $myPage, $myApp;

		$dat_id = $this->getI("dat_id");
		if ($dat_id==0)
		{
			return;
		}

		$myCO = new CO_Gallery($dat_id);

		// get information about gallery images
		$_images = Array();
		foreach ($myCO->getImagesArray() AS $_image)
		{
			// Define url for detail view of an image
			// We want to keep our navigation state, so we encode the id of the current page into the url
			$smartUID = "image".$_image["pos"].",".$myPage->id.".html";
			$_image["url_view"] = url_for_page(PhenotypeApplication::pag_id_galleryview,array("gal_id"=>$dat_id),null,$smartUID);
			$_images[]=$_image;
		}

		eval ($this->initRendering());
		$mySmarty->assign("gallery",$myCO);
		$mySmarty->assign("images",$_images);
		$html = $mySmarty->fetch($TPL_1);
		return $html;
	}


}
